    • launch

      public static void launch​(int width, int height, int framerate, int tickSpeed, boolean resizable, java.lang.String title)
      launch the instance of the application
      Parameters:
      width - width of window
      height - height of window
      framerate - framerate of window (hertz)
      tickSpeed - tick speed for physics (hertz)
      resizable - resizable status
      title - window title
